| Attribute | Type | Description | Examples | Stability |

| <a id="app-payment-card-type" href="#app-payment-card-type">`app.payment.card_type`</a> | string | Type of credit card used | `visa`; `mastercard` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
